channel.title: The Cranberries on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in The Cranberries on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Why “Zombie” Lingers
item.description: [big]It’s painful every time we lose a major rock star, especially one who still had a lot of years left in front of them, as Irish singer and Cranberries frontwoman Dolores O’Riordan did. She hadn’t even hit age 50 yet, and her career was such that her biggest successes came and went before she had hit the age of 30. “Linger” and “Zombie” were sizable hits before she had even turned 24.
